sect2.title: Installation of Pine
sect2.para: Install Pine by running the following commands:

userinput.command: patch -Np1 -i ../pine-&pine-version;-fhs-3.patch && ./build DEBUG=-O MAILSPOOL=/var/mail \ SSLDIR=/usr SSLCERTS=/etc/ssl/certs slx && cp doc/*.1 /usr/share/man/man1 && cd bin && install pine imapd ipop2d ipop3d mailutil mtest pico \ pilot rpdump rpload /usr/bin
